q.para: Q: What is the cancellation policy?

a.para: A: Tickets must be refunded at least 24 hours prior to the reserved time slot. If you wish to cancel a ticket with less than 24 hours notice, we can reissue the ticket for a later date and time, but not refund it.

q.para: Q: Is Top of the Rock weather dependent?

a.para: A: Top of the Rock is open 7 days a week and 365 days a year, despite weather conditions. Guests can still enjoy the view from the interior space at the Top if weather is inclement. Guests will always be advised about weather conditions if there is poor visibility prior to entry of Top of the Rock.

q.para: Q: Can I change my ticket time online?

a.para: A: In order to change your ticket time, you must refund your ticket through the online refund option (if you purchased online originally) and purchase a new ticket for your desired time.

q.para: Q: Can I refund a single ticket if I purchased more than one online?

a.para: A: In order to refund any part of your transaction, you must refund the entire transaction and re-book the tickets.
